database.name: massive
database.description: The Massive Database contains information about all the proteomics/metabolomics datasets in massive

entry.name: GNPS Interaction between Pseudoalteromonas sp OT59 and Penicillium citrinum
entry.description: MS/MS network analysis of OT59 and P. citrinum extracts. The various metabolite classes found are: alteramides, estatins, citrinin, bromoalterochromides, and citrinadins.
